name: Corrida Espacial
description:
Due to some unforeseen consequences you are stranded on spaceship with alien thirsty for your blood. Emergency systems worked better than intended, so the only way to open the doors is to trick monster to open them for you. Some doors are stronger than others. Trick monster to crash into toxic  canisters, around the map to make him angrier and stronger, but watch out - it will also make him faster.

Unfortunately I wasn't able to finish everything during the jam, so build below is more or less proof of concept than complete game. There's no title screens, UI and even any sound, although you can complete it. 

WSAD / Arrow keys - Control your character

R - Restart level

ESC - Close the game
